messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-Discussion] Digest Number 3789
messages.msgSnippet: ... 16 ... son ... are ... It has been so good for me to read all of these responses.  Ds turned 15 February also, and he has *absolutely* no interest in
messages.messageBody:
>Both my older girls were 17 when they got their license. >Both waited till
16
>for the learner's permit (you can get that the day you turn >15 here). My
son
>turned 15 in February and hasn't even read the book >yet. Maybe our kids
are
>just content to be kids a little longer than most.

It has been so good for me to read all of these responses. Ds turned 15
February also, and he has *absolutely* no interest in learning to drive
(and, given that he's a day-dreamy, absent-minded-professor type, I'm not in
a hurry either!). My mother has been urging me to make him start, and dh
has even chimed in occasionally.

Laura
